room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard's Treasure" by Escape Hunt in Miami
room_description:
One of the most hunted and feared captains during the Golden Age of Piracy, Edward Teach was a man of many secrets. His brig, The Queen Anne's Revenge, was rumored to hold unimaginable treasures. For centuries, the ship was lost somewhere in the ocean, and the treasure remained a legend.
You found the remains of an abandoned ship near a secluded beach. Can you solve the puzzles and find the clues to reveal the location of the treasure? Or will you run out of time and find yourself on a sinking ship?
